mods.name: Visual Triggers
description:
Provides a keybind for outlining waypoints and triggers with skeleton debug cylinders.
By defualt "8" will toggle waypoints and "9" will toggle triggers. 
There is also an option in the mod menu: 
*The number of lines slider allows you to set the number of line segments you want the debug cylinders to draw with from 6 to 50. 
Please see the readme for important info on the functionality and known issues with the mod.
